name: Bokays 3D
description:
Bokays 3D is an Awesome App that enables you to create a custom Bokay and send it to someone that you care about via email.

It can send and receive Bokays from any ios Device... iPad to iPod, iPod to iPad Mini, iPod to iPod, etc...

Check out the how-to video via
http://youtu.be/UgsS9-CsHjk
